text: Announcer
Announcer
Audience
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

『The next artists to grace the stage are here!
The one who just energized the venue with their unit performance is──』
『──Asahi Serizawa!』
…Amazing...

Seriously...
...Why did I end up in the same unit as her?

There's no way I could ever beat her
I just... can't stand her.

No matter what Fuyuko does,
there's no way she can win against her──

Asahi-chan, did you stop dancing...?
This isn't part of the choreography, right...?
...Do you even realize what you did?

Showing such a pathetic sight in front of the audience, stopping
the recording. Stop being silent and explain what's going on already.

Fuyuko-chan is scary~
Even if I wanted to, I couldn't say anything~

............
While standing on the stage, it suddenly feels cold...

──......
Why am I even here...?

...Everyone,
Can we talk for a moment?

Could we have a proper discussion once
So we can understand each other better?

Let's reconsider what we want to do,
What we wanted to achieve...

...Alright, I'm going to talk to the staff
Asahi, let's go apologize together.

──Hey, I have something to discuss/
──Hey, there's something I want to talk about
